video.title: Gilmore Girls
video.synopsis: Fiercely independent single mom Lorelai raises gifted, Ivy League-bound daughter Rory amid a continual stream of quick-witted repartee.

episodes.synopsis: When Rory is accepted to attend a prestigious prep school, Lorelai must swallow her pride and ask her wealthy parents for help paying the tuition.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Rory's first day at Chilton doesn't go smoothly: First, Lorelai's attire offends Emily and the headmaster; then she meets some obnoxious classmates.
episodes.title: The Lorelais' First Day at Chilton

episodes.synopsis: When Rory and Richard bond during a day of golf at the club, Lorelai feels jealous of Rory's deepening connection with her grandparents.
episodes.title: Kill Me Now

episodes.synopsis: After Rory receives a "D" on her English paper, Lorelai helps her cram for a big Shakespeare test -- but they both oversleep on test day.
episodes.title: The Deer Hunters

episodes.synopsis: While Rory's teacher Max and Lorelai admit they have feelings for each other, Rory's budding relationship with Dean moves forward.
episodes.title: Cinnamon's Wake

episodes.synopsis: Rory clashes with Emily when Emily plans a formal birthday party for her. Meanwhile, Lorelai organizes a casual get-together to celebrate.
episodes.title: Rory's Birthday Parties

episodes.synopsis: Rory gets her first kiss from Dean, but doesn't tell Lorelai. When Lorelai hears about the kiss from Mrs. Kim, she invites Dean over for movie night.
episodes.title: Kiss and Tell

episodes.synopsis: Snow strands Rory at her grandparents' home, while Lorelai spends the day with Max. Meanwhile, Lane misses Rory and comes to visit.
episodes.title: Love & War & Snow

episodes.synopsis: Rory attends her first dance with Dean, but they fall asleep and get home late, causing Emily and Lorelai to fight over Lorelai's mothering skills.
episodes.title: Rory's Dance

episodes.synopsis: Richard collapses at the Gilmores' Christmas party; Dean assures Lorelai that nothing improper happened the night he and Rory fell asleep together.
episodes.title: Forgiveness and Stuff

episodes.synopsis: After Paris causes a scandal by exposing the relationship between Lorelai and Rory's teacher Max, Rory furiously confronts her.
episodes.title: Paris is Burning

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai goes on a hellish double date with Sookie, Jackson and Jackson's odd cousin. Meanwhile, Rory double dates with Dean, Lane and Dean's friend.
episodes.title: Double Date

episodes.synopsis: Trouble ensues when Rory takes her friends to a Bangles concert in New York. Lorelai learns something about Luke's romantic past.
episodes.title: Concert Interruptus

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Dean argue about women's roles after watching "The Donna Reed Show." Emily makes Lorelai face her feelings for Luke.
episodes.title: That Damn Donna Reed

episodes.synopsis: Rory's father returns, causing tension in Emily and Richard's house -- and forcing Lorelai to make a big decision about her family's future.
episodes.title: Christopher Returns

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Dean celebrate their three-month anniversary, but things don't go as planned. Luke's ex-girlfriend Rachel arrives in town.
episodes.title: Star-Crossed Lovers and Other Strangers

episodes.synopsis: After Dean ends their relationship on the night of their three-month anniversary, Rory keeps busy, refusing to give in to self-pity.
episodes.title: The Breakup, Part II

episodes.synopsis: When Lorelai's grandmother offers a trust fund for Rory's education, Emily fears losing contact with a financially independent Lorelai and Rory.
episodes.title: The Third Lorelai

episodes.synopsis: Emily is horrified when she sees the place where Lorelai and Rory first lived, so she sets out to create a perfect bedroom for Rory in her house.
episodes.title: Emily in Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: Still upset over her breakup with Dean, Rory becomes angry with Lorelai, who didn't tell her that she is dating Max again.
episodes.title: P.S. I Lo...

episodes.synopsis: Rory finally tells Dean that she loves him. Rachel senses that Lorelai and Luke are attracted and leaves town rather than pursue Luke anymore.
episodes.title: Love, Daisies and Troubadours

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai accepts Max's proposal, but when Emily hears about the upcoming wedding, she's hurt and angry that Lorelai didn't bother to tell her.
episodes.title: Sadie, Sadie...

episodes.synopsis: Rory's sudden flurry of extracurricular activity strains her relationship with Dean. Emily is cold when Lorelai finally reveals her engagement.
episodes.title: Hammers and Veils

episodes.synopsis: During a wild bachelorette party, Lorelai impulsively calls Rory's father, Christopher, which gives her second thoughts about marrying Max.
episodes.title: Red Light on the Wedding Night

episodes.synopsis: With the wedding canceled, Lorelai is eager to escape the reactions of everyone in Stars Hollow, so she and Rory take off on a road trip.
episodes.title: The Road Trip to Harvard

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai's advice doesn't dissuade Luke from reluctantly agreeing to care for his wild teenage nephew, Jess. Rory finds herself attracted to Jess.
episodes.title: Nick & Nora/Sid & Nancy

episodes.synopsis: Rory surprises everyone by agreeing to make her debut at a ball, and Lorelai finds herself attracted to the now more responsible Christopher.
episodes.title: Presenting Lorelai Gilmore

episodes.synopsis: Advised to become more social at Chilton, Rory winds up in the most popular school clique, while Lorelai helps with a fundraising fashion show.
episodes.title: Like Mother, Like Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Sookie have the first fight of their long friendship when Lorelai panics and decides their dream of opening an inn together will fail.
episodes.title: The Ins & Outs of Inns

episodes.synopsis: When Rory and her classmate Tristan are cast as Romeo and Juliet in a school play, a jealous Dean insists on attending every rehearsal.
episodes.title: Run Away Little Boy

episodes.synopsis: While Rory struggles to keep the budding rivalry between Dean and Jess under control, Lorelai invites most of Stars Hollow to an elaborate feast.
episodes.title: The Bracebridge Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai can't afford to repair her home's extensive termite damage but becomes angry when Rory involves Emily, who again offers Lorelai a loan.
episodes.title: Secrets and Loans

episodes.synopsis: Newly retired Richard is driving Emily crazy, so Lorelai agrees to take her father for a day in Stars Hollow, where he annoys both Lorelai and Rory.
episodes.title: Richard in Stars Hollow

episodes.synopsis: The annual Stars Hollow Picnic Basket Auction causes romantic complications when Jess outbids Dean to win a picnic lunch date with Rory.
episodes.title: A-Tisket, A-Tasket

episodes.synopsis: Christopher brings his new girlfriend to Stars Hollow, and she wants to get to know Rory. Emily is furious that Lorelai didn't win Christopher back.
episodes.title: It Should've Been Lorelai

episodes.synopsis: Rory panics when she realizes she's lost the bracelet Dean made for her. When Lorelai witnesses Jess in Rory's room, she accuses him of stealing it.
episodes.title: Lost & Found

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Emily's weekend at a spa doesn't go as planned. Meanwhile, Rory's night alone becomes difficult when Paris, Jess and Dean arrive.
episodes.title: There's the Rub

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Rory help out at the diner while Luke makes funeral arrangements for his uncle. Emily goes overboard helping plan Sookie's wedding.
episodes.title: Dead Uncles & Vegetables

episodes.synopsis: After helping Rory with her project for Chilton's annual business fair, Richard realizes he's tired of retirement and wants to start a second career.
episodes.title: Back in the Saddle Again

episodes.synopsis: As a favor to Luke, Rory tutors Jess, but during their first study session, Jess convinces Rory to let him drive her car, which he crashes.
episodes.title: Teach Me Tonight

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai helps Richard establish a consulting business. Rory becomes angry that everyone blames Jess for the accident that broke her wrist.
episodes.title: Help Wanted

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai's about to graduate from business school, and Rory secretly invites guests to her graduation ceremony; Rory goes to New York to see Jess.
episodes.title: Lorelai's Graduation Day

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of Sookie's wedding, Lorelai and Christopher share a romantic night together. Meanwhile, Rory's thrilled when Jess returns to Stars Hollow.
episodes.title: I Can't Get Started

episodes.synopsis: Back from a summer internship in Washington, D.C., Rory finds herself torn between Dean and Jess. With Christopher gone, Lorelai questions her future.
episodes.title: Lazy-Hazy-Crazy Days

episodes.synopsis: Emily's attempts to reunite Christopher with Lorelai and Rory result in an ugly confrontation between Rory and Christopher.
episodes.title: Haunted Leg

episodes.synopsis: After a Harvard application arrives, Rory and Lorelai seek advice. Meanwhile, Lane is enamored with a boy who answers her ad for rock band members.
episodes.title: Application Anxiety

episodes.synopsis: Things get ugly when Lorelai speaks at the high school's career day. To rebel against her conservative mother, Lane dyes her hair purple.
episodes.title: One's Got Class and the Other One Dyes

episodes.synopsis: After a disastrous date with a man she met at an auction organized by Emily, Lorelai tries to cancel the second date, despite her parents' objections.
episodes.title: Eight O'Clock at the Oasis

episodes.synopsis: When Lorelai winds up attending Sherry's baby shower with Rory, she learns more about Christopher's life than she wanted to know.
episodes.title: Take the Deviled Eggs...

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai forces Rory to be her partner at the Stars Hollow dance marathon, where Rory and Jess can't stop arguing -- which Dean definitely notices.
episodes.title: They Shoot Gilmores, Don't They?

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai, Rory, Richard and Emily visit Yale University, but Richard causes trouble by arranging an interview for Rory with the dean of admissions.
episodes.title: Let the Games Begin

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Rory have four Thanksgivings when they stop for celebrations with Lane, Sookie and Luke on the way to dinner with Richard and Emily.
episodes.title: A Deep-Fried Korean Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai misses the town carnival when Richard's mother arrives. Jess won't take Rory to the carnival -- until he learns she might go with Dean.
episodes.title: That'll Do, Pig

episodes.synopsis: A classmate convinces Paris that Rory has been plotting against her. Meanwhile, Emily is sued by a former maid, and Lorelai meets an interesting man.
episodes.title: I Solemnly Swear...

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai gets an angling lesson from Luke before her fishing date with her new beau. Meanwhile, the political battle between Rory and Paris escalates.
episodes.title: Lorelai Out of Water

episodes.synopsis: When Christopher's pregnant girlfriend goes into labor and asks Rory to stay with her at the hospital, Lorelai reminisces about the day Rory was born.
episodes.title: Dear Emily and Richard

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai goes away with her new boyfriend, Alex, for a weekend in New York, but she worries about leaving Rory and Jess together.
episodes.title: Swan Song

episodes.synopsis: Tired of waiting for Jess to call and make plans for the weekend, Rory goes to a hockey game with Lane, where she sees Dean and his new girlfriend.
episodes.title: Face-Off

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Paris compete to give a speech at a school celebration. Meanwhile, Lorelai shares a passionate kiss with her former fiancé, Max.
episodes.title: The Big One

episodes.synopsis: When a meeting of the Edgar Allan Poe Society at her inn is interrupted by a minor fire, Lorelai must find rooms for the guests at homes around town.
episodes.title: A Tale of Poes and Fire

episodes.synopsis: While Lorelai deals with the rebuilding of the fire-damaged inn, Rory schemes to give her mom a great birthday party, complete with a gigantic pizza.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday, Baby

episodes.synopsis: Rory plans to attend prom with Jess. Lane's rock band debuts at a big party, where longstanding animosity between Jess and Dean finally explodes.
episodes.title: Keg! Max!

episodes.synopsis: After Jess and Dean's brawl, Lane is in trouble with her mother, and Luke is furious at Jess. Later, Jess's estranged father appears at the diner.
episodes.title: Say Goodnight, Gracie

episodes.synopsis: Jess leaves for California, where his father lives. Rory helps Emily choose an outfit for Rory's graduation, resulting in a conflict with Lorelai.
episodes.title: Here Comes the Son

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai prepare for Rory's graduation from Chilton. But major developments involving the Independence Inn threaten to dampen the festivities.
episodes.title: Those Are Strings, Pinocchio

episodes.synopsis: After returning from a summer of backpacking through Europe, Rory and Lorelai frantically prepare for Rory's move to attend Yale.
episodes.title: Ballrooms & Biscotti

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai move Rory into her dorm, where she meets an odd new roommate and learns that her old adversary, Paris, will also be sharing her room.
episodes.title: The Lorelais' First Day at Yale

episodes.synopsis: Emily redecorates Rory's dorm room without her permission. Lorelai and Sookie cater a kids' birthday party with a "Lord of the Rings" theme.
episodes.title: The Hobbit, the Sofa and Digger Stiles

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Stars Hollow for the weekend, Rory encounters her ex-boyfriend Dean, who awkwardly invites her to his wedding the next day.
episodes.title: Chicken or Beef?

episodes.synopsis: Rory has her first date since ending her relationship with Jess and finds that college dating isn't easy. Lorelai invites Luke over for movie night.
episodes.title: The Fundamental Things Apply

episodes.synopsis: Emily hires Lorelai and Sookie to cater an elaborate launch party for Richard's new company, but insists they prove that they are worthy of her trust.
episodes.title: An Affair to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai participate in a Stars Hollow event in which the townspeople dress up and present tableaux imitating famous paintings.
episodes.title: The Festival of Living Art

episodes.synopsis: Rory tries to spice up her articles for the Yale student newspaper; Luke admits to Lorelai that he and Nicole are attempting to save their marriage.
episodes.title: Die, Jerk

episodes.synopsis: Emily realizes that Richard has been secretly meeting his ex-fiancée for lunch for years. Lorelai accepts Jason's invitation to dinner.
episodes.title: Ted Koppel's Big Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Sookie renovate their inn; Lorelai spends a romantic night with Jason; Rory is irritated by Paris's relationship with her older professor.
episodes.title: The Nanny and the Professor

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is upset that Luke has gotten an apartment with Nicole in another town. A guy Rory likes has been telling people she's obsessed with him.
episodes.title: In the Clamor and the Clangor

episodes.synopsis: Luke is wary when his sister comes to town. Lorelai hesitates to tell her parents about dating Jason. Paris's affair with the professor gets serious.
episodes.title: A Family Matter

episodes.synopsis: Stranded in Stars Hollow while his car is being repaired, Jess keeps crossing paths with Rory -- but he walks away from her every time.
episodes.title: Nag Hammadi Is Where They Found the Gnostic Gospels

episodes.synopsis: Overwhelmed by her classwork at Yale, Rory confides in her ex-boyfriend Dean, who's working on the construction crew at the Dragonfly Inn.
episodes.title: The Incredible Sinking Lorelais

episodes.synopsis: Rory gets a glimpse of Dean's new life. When Lorelai and Rory spend a day at the mall, they run into Emily on a wild shopping spree.
episodes.title: Scene in a Mall

episodes.synopsis: Richard is devastated when Gran dies suddenly. While Emily plans the funeral, she finds a letter Gran wrote to Richard begging him not to marry Emily.
episodes.title: The Reigning Lorelai

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Paris head south for their first spring break in Florida, where they run into their old pals from Chilton, Madeline and Louise.
episodes.title: Girls in Bikinis, Boys Doin' the Twist

episodes.synopsis: Jason's father sues Jason and Richard; Rory is upset that Dean has dropped out of college; Lindsay tells Dean to stop spending time with Rory.
episodes.title: Tick, Tick, Tick Boom

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai confronts her father when she learns that Jason and Richard have cut their business ties. Luke tells Lorelai that he and Nicole are divorcing.
episodes.title: Afterboom

episodes.synopsis: A self-help tape helps a depressed Luke realize he already knows his soul mate. Lorelai is stressed as the Dragonfly Inn's opening day approaches.
episodes.title: Luke Can See Her Face

episodes.synopsis: Jess walks his mother down the aisle at her Renaissance-themed wedding; Luke asks Lorelai on a date; Dean confides in Rory about his unhappy marriage.
episodes.title: Last Week Fights, This Week Tights

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai invites friends and family to do a test run of the Dragonfly Inn opening; both Luke and Jason are romantically interested in Lorelai.
episodes.title: Raincoats & Recipes

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai argue about Rory sleeping with married Dean. Luke and Lorelai are happy together. Emily and Rory plan to take a European trip.
episodes.title: Say Goodbye to Daisy Miller

episodes.synopsis: After Rory apologizes to Lorelai, she sends Dean a letter from Europe, but his wife finds it and kicks him out. Meanwhile, Luke returns home.
episodes.title: A Messenger, Nothing More

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is a little offended that no one cares about her relationship with Luke -- until it becomes a topic of heated discussion at the town meeting.
episodes.title: Written in the Stars

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Dean meet alone to discuss their relationship. Lorelai and Sookie manage Jackson's campaign against Taylor for town selectman.
episodes.title: Tippecanoe and Taylor, Too

episodes.synopsis: Wanting to smooth over her relationship with Dean, Lorelai suggests that she and Luke double date with Rory and Dean -- but the evening goes awry.
episodes.title: We Got Us a Pippi Virgin

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Sookie are thrilled when Norman Mailer starts frequenting the Dragonfly Inn dining room. Rory discovers an intriguing secret society.
episodes.title: Norman Mailer, I'm Pregnant

episodes.synopsis: Logan takes Rory to an elaborate event staged by his secret society. After discovering she's dating Luke, Lorelai's parents spend time with him.
episodes.title: You Jump, I Jump, Jack

episodes.synopsis: When Emily and Richard throw a party to introduce Rory to their Yale alumni friends, she realizes Dean doesn't fit into her privileged world.
episodes.title: The Party's Over

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai plan to convince Richard and Emily to end their separation, but Emily dashes their hopes by announcing she's ready to begin dating.
episodes.title: Emily Says 'Hello'

episodes.synopsis: Rory hosts a student from her prep school who's considering applying to Yale, but things don't go as planned. Lorelai and Luke have their first fight.
episodes.title: But Not As Cute As Pushkin

episodes.synopsis: When Christopher visits Rory at Yale, she rejects his attempt at reconciliation. Lorelai consoles Christopher but doesn't tell Luke where she was.
episodes.title: Women of Questionable Morals

episodes.synopsis: Rory offers to help Logan write an article. When Richard sees Emily talking to a man she dated, he rear-ends her car.
episodes.title: Come Home

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Rory throw Emily a bachelorette party; Richard and Emily renew their marriage vows; Rory tells Logan she wants a relationship with him.
episodes.title: Wedding Bell Blues

episodes.synopsis: After the disastrous scene at her parents' marriage recommitment ceremony, Lorelai begs Luke not to give up on their relationship.
episodes.title: Say Something

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is upset about her breakup with Luke. Luke builds sets for the elementary school play in hopes of seeing Lorelai, who's the costume designer.
episodes.title: Jews and Chinese Food

episodes.synopsis: Richard and Emily return from their second honeymoon. Miserable without Lorelai, Luke burns food and throws customers who complain out of the diner.
episodes.title: So...Good Talk

episodes.synopsis: After seeing Logan with another girl, Rory regrets their decision to date other people. Lorelai is reunited with Luke but remains cold toward Emily.
episodes.title: Pulp Friction

episodes.synopsis: Luke helps turn an old house into a museum. Lorelai says too much during an interview about the inn. Rory, Paris and Lane have boyfriend trouble.
episodes.title: To Die and Let Diorama

episodes.synopsis: When Rory tells Logan she can't have a casual relationship with him, he surprises her by agreeing to be exclusive. Sookie is placed on bed rest.
episodes.title: But I'm a Gilmore

episodes.synopsis: Rory begins her internship at one of Logan's father's newspapers. Emily and Richard fawn over Logan, but Lorelai is not as impressed.
episodes.title: How Many Kropogs to Cape Cod?

episodes.synopsis: Rory is surprised by the performance review she receives from Logan's father. Luke's plan to buy the Twickham house is threatened by a competing bid.
episodes.title: Blame Booze and Melville

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai rescues Rory after a night of reckless behavior with Logan. Shocked to hear her daughter's plans for the future, she turns to Luke for help.
episodes.title: A House is Not a Home

episodes.synopsis: Luke responds to Lorelai's proposal. Rory is sentenced for stealing the yacht. Angry with Rory, Richard and Emily, Lorelai cuts off ties with them.
episodes.title: New and Improved Lorelai

episodes.synopsis: Rory winds up in a fight while working on a road crew for community service. Lorelai buys a dog. Luke and Lorelai decide to renovate Lorelai's house.
episodes.title: Fight Face

episodes.synopsis: Rory takes a job at Emily's Daughters of the American Revolution office and serves as her grandmother's spy. Lorelai won't commit to a wedding date.
episodes.title: The Ungraduate

episodes.synopsis: Sookie hopes to reconcile the estranged Gilmore girls by asking both Lorelai and Rory to be godparents to her kids, but things don't go as planned.
episodes.title: Always a Godmother, Never a God

episodes.synopsis: After two separate confrontations with the Huntzbergers at a D.A.R. party, Richard and Emily realize Lorelai was right about their treatment of Rory.
episodes.title: We've Got Magic to Do

episodes.synopsis: After asking Logan about Rory's future plans, Richard admits it was a mistake to let Rory drop out of Yale and comes to Lorelai to discuss the matter.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Dollhouse

episodes.synopsis: Both Lorelai and Rory are saddened that their estrangement will keep them from spending Rory's 21st birthday the way they had always planned.
episodes.title: Twenty-One is the Loneliest Number

episodes.synopsis: When her former boyfriend Jess visits and reveals an amazing success, Rory begins rethinking the choices she's made with her life.
episodes.title: Let Me Hear Your Balalaikas Ringing Out

episodes.synopsis: After months of estrangement, Lorelai and Rory make their first move toward reconciliation. Luke gets a big surprise but conceals it from Lorelai.
episodes.title: The Prodigal Daughter Returns

episodes.synopsis: Rory's long-absent father reappears in the lives of Lorelai and Rory, and Luke struggles with what this will mean to his relationship with Lorelai.
episodes.title: He's Slippin' 'Em Bread ... Dig?

episodes.synopsis: Wanting to get to know his newly discovered daughter, Luke visits her mom. Lorelai sets a wedding date but has a feeling something's not right.
episodes.title: The Perfect Dress

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai finds out about Luke's daughter but not from Luke. She tries to be supportive, but Luke's reaction hurts her. Logan tries to win Rory back.
episodes.title: Just Like Gwen and Gavin

episodes.synopsis: Luke gets to know April. Rory tries to get the Yale newspaper out after the staff quits. All four Gilmores vent their frustrations at each other.
episodes.title: Friday Night's Alright for Fighting

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai brings Luke to dinner with her parents. When Rory becomes the new editor of the Yale paper, Paris kicks her out of their apartment.
episodes.title: You've Been Gilmored

episodes.synopsis: Rory, Logan, Lorelai and Luke spend Valentine's Day weekend on Martha's Vineyard. Luke is cool toward Logan until Logan saves the day.
episodes.title: A Vineyard Valentine

episodes.synopsis: Rory dazzles the crowd at a Yale journalism panel, but the next day, she's devastated to learn how Logan behaved during their breakup.
episodes.title: Bridesmaids Revisited

episodes.synopsis: Rory forgives Logan. Lorelai is secretly upset when Luke spends a few days with his daughter, April. Rory spies on April's mother.
episodes.title: I'm OK, You're OK

episodes.synopsis: Unhappy because Rory hasn't really forgiven him, Logan takes off with his friends. Rory runs into Luke and April at Jess's book store in Philadelphia.
episodes.title: The Real Paul Anka

episodes.synopsis: After a night of pre-wedding festivities, Lane and Zach get married in two ceremonies -- one Buddhist and one Seventh Day Adventist.
episodes.title: I Get a Sidekick out of You

episodes.synopsis: When Luke plans a birthday party for April at the diner, Lorelai wants to help and is hurt that Luke thinks it's too soon for her to meet April.
episodes.title: Super Cool Party People

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai helps Emily while she's unable to see after minor eye surgery. Rory takes charge of Logan's recovery when he's released from the hospital.
episodes.title: Driving Miss Gilmore

episodes.synopsis: Rory throws a graduation party for Logan, but their time together is bittersweet because he's moving to London. Lorelai delivers an ultimatum to Luke.
episodes.title: Partings

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is mortified when she wakes up in bed with Christopher the morning after fighting with Luke. Rory is puzzled by Logan's going-away present.
episodes.title: The Long Morrow

episodes.synopsis: Rory's upset when she and Logan have to cancel a long-planned trip to Asia, so Lorelai turns her house into an Asian-themed wonderland.
episodes.title: That's What You Get, Folks, For Makin' Whoopie

episodes.synopsis: Following her breakup with Luke, Lorelai realizes her parents aren't as terrible as she thought. Rory's long-distance relationship is a struggle.
episodes.title: Lorelai's First Cotillion

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Christopher are back together again, though Lorelai is having trouble fully committing to the relationship. April comes to stay with Luke.
episodes.title: 'S Wonderful, 'S Marvelous

episodes.synopsis: Rory is thrilled when Logan's in town on business but realizes during a dinner with Logan's colleagues that she has no connection to his new world.
episodes.title: The Great Stink

episodes.synopsis: Christopher treats Rory's "Yale Daily News" co-workers to lunch, but the meal ends abruptly when Rory insists they cover a breaking story.
episodes.title: Go Bulldogs!

episodes.synopsis: Christopher and Lorelai take his daughter to visit her mother in Paris. Rory's tenure as editor-in-chief of the Yale paper comes to an end.
episodes.title: French Twist

episodes.synopsis: Rory pretends to be thrilled that Christopher and Lorelai got married in Paris but lets Lorelai know how upset she is when Christopher leaves.
episodes.title: Introducing Lorelai Planetarium

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai wants the Stars Hollow residents to like Christopher, but his well-intentioned gesture at the knit-a-thon brings the event to an early end.
episodes.title: Knit, People, Knit

episodes.synopsis: When Christopher witnesses a sweet moment between Luke and Lorelai, he becomes concerned about Lorelai's commitment to their marriage.
episodes.title: Merry Fisticuffs

episodes.synopsis: Luke asks Lorelai to write a character reference letter for his custody case. Lorelai, Christopher and Rory have a late but extravagant Christmas.
episodes.title: Santa's Secret Stuff

episodes.synopsis: Sookie's acting strange. Luke attends a custody hearing. Christopher confronts Lorelai about the character reference letter she wrote for Luke.
episodes.title: To Whom It May Concern

episodes.synopsis: Richard's in the hospital, and Lorelai can't reach Christopher. Meanwhile, Logan and Luke drop everything to support Rory, Lorelai and Emily.
episodes.title: I'd Rather Be in Philadelphia

episodes.synopsis: Richard is on the road to recovery. Rory has a crush on the teacher filling in for Richard. Christopher and Lorelai talk about their marriage.
episodes.title: Farewell, My Pet

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai helps Emily organize Richard's recovery but has trouble revealing that her marriage has ended. Rory attends a birthday dinner for Logan.
episodes.title: I'm a Kayak, Hear Me Roar

episodes.synopsis: Rory has an interview. Lorelai must settle a fight between Lane and her mother. Logan reveals his business failure to Rory.
episodes.title: Will You Be My Lorelai Gilmore?

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai, Rory and Emily go on a road trip to attend the wedding of an old friend. Logan makes a surprise appearance and asks Rory to forgive him.
episodes.title: Gilmore Girls Only

episodes.synopsis: Rory shows Logan around Stars Hollow. Lorelai worries he's too irresponsible. Lorelai and Luke admit they both made mistakes in their relationship.
episodes.title: Hay Bale Maze

episodes.synopsis: After an awkward encounter, Lorelai and Luke start fighting, which Lorelai takes as a good sign. Rory gets a letter that impacts her future plans.
episodes.title: It's Just Like Riding a Bike

episodes.synopsis: Rory has a scary dream about her future. Logan discusses Rory's future with Lorelai. Lorelai hits the stage on karaoke night to serenade Luke.
episodes.title: Lorelai? Lorelai?

episodes.synopsis: Emily and Richard host a graduation party for Rory. Lorelai and Christopher are relieved to find they can still be friends. Logan proposes to Rory.
episodes.title: Unto the Breach

episodes.synopsis: In this series finale, Rory lands her dream job as a political reporter, and Luke enlists everyone in Stars Hollow to throw her a farewell party.
episodes.title: Bon Voyage
